motto.title: #The Favored One
motto.body: Founded in 2019, Favored one is the first direct selling company that has its own digital technology ecosystem.

section_1.title: VISION
section_1.body: Provide service and satisfaction in facial beauty, as well as increase the value of selling products, domestic or foreign, in order to compete with global products

section_2.title: MISSION
section_2.body: Give everyone a fair chance to start an independent business, and achieve their hopes and dreams.

company_legality.title: COMPANY LEGALITY
left_section: KEPUTUSAN MENTERI HUKUM DAN HAK ASASI MANUSIA REPUBLIK INDONESIA
right_section: NAMA PERUSAHAAN : PT BERKAT IMAN HIDUP
